execution_plan.description: Find all shipped order item IDs and their shipment tracking numbers by joining shipment_items to shipments.
execution_plan.query: SELECT si.order_item_id, s.shipment_tracking_number FROM shipment_items si JOIN shipments s ON si.shipment_id = s.shipment_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve the status codes for the order items that were shipped (those order_item_id values returned by step 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_item_id, order_item_status_code FROM Order_Items WHERE order_item_id IN ($step1.order_item_id);
